input.sentences: the sky began to turn grey .
the waves made a big splash against the rocks .
it looked as though it was about to rain .
he walked on the beach after the water began to calm down .
output.sentences: At first, I thought that the day at the beach would be nice and calm.
As the day continued though, the sky started to turn grey and the waves got larger and larger.
The waves were hitting hard against the nearby rocks.
It looked like it was going to start to rain pretty hard.
Then all of a sudden there was a break in the clouds and the sea became calm again.
